quote: To err is human, but to really foul things up you need a computer.
author: Paul Ehrlich

quote: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Computers are the most remarkable tools ever invented, but they are also the most dangerous.
author: Isaac Asimov
source: The Computer and the Human Mind

quote: The human brain is like a computer which will only give the right answers if you program it properly.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Computers are like Old Testament gods; lots of rules and no mercy.
author: Joseph Weizenbaum

quote: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window.
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: The computer is a tool which helps us to extend our mental powers.
author: Marvin Minsky

quote: I think computers should have emotions. Maybe then they would understand me better.
author: Charles Stross

quote: Computers make it easier to do a lot of things, but most of the things they make easier are things that you shouldn't be doing in the first place.
author: Andy Rooney

quote: I think computers are wonderful machines. They're the only machines that can make you look smart by comparison.
author: Bill Gates
